alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Dixon (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 24 at 5:24AM CDT until June 24 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 369 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN IOWA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST IOWA CHEROKEE LYON PLYMOUTH SIOUX IN WEST CENTRAL IOWA IDA WOODBURY IN NEBRASKA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NEBRASKA DAKOTA DIXON IN SOUTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA LAKE MOODY IN SOUTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA CLAY LINCOLN MINNEHAHA TURNER UNION THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALCESTER, ALLEN, BATTLE CREEK, BERESFORD, CANTON, CENTERVILLE, CHANCELLOR, CHEROKEE, ELK POINT, FLANDREAU, GEORGE, HARRISBURG, HAWARDEN, HOLSTEIN, HULL, HURLEY, IDA GROVE, INWOOD, IRENE, JEFFERSON, LARCHWOOD, LE MARS, LENNOX, MADISON, MARION, NORTH SIOUX CITY, ORANGE CITY, ORLAND, PARKER, PONCA, ROCK RAPIDS, ROCK VALLEY, SIOUX CENTER, SIOUX CITY, SIOUX FALLS, SOUTH SIOUX CITY, TEA, VERMILLION, VIBORG, AND WAKEFIELD.
